text:
(Growth hacker | Paris, France | full time | ONSITE)

Manomano (Manomano.fr, ManoMano.it, ManoMano.de, manomano.es, manomano.uk), one of the top 3 fastest growing start-up in France is looking for a new member for its growth team. Proficiency in php or python required. With acquisition specialists and data scientists, you will do stuff that very few people (no one?) have ever done.

Send a mail to Maxime@manomano.fr. English or French required. http://blog.manomano.fr/growth-hacker-hf-en-cdi/
